description: T1- London Plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points points retaining furnishing growth for crown continuity. Remove epicormic growth from main stem. Remove deadwood.T2 - London Plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth for crown continuity. Remove epicormic growth from main stem. Remove deadwood. T3 -London Plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth for crown continuity. Remove epicormic growth from main stem. Remove deadwood. T4 -London Plane: Crown reduce back to previous, most recent reduction points retaining furnishing growth for crown continuity. Remove epicormic growth from main stem. Remove deadwood. T6 - Tree of Heaven - Crown reduce to previous points of reduction. Remove deadwood, weak and suppressed branches and sucker regrowth. Lift canopy all round by 1-2m.
